title: Okta FastPass Setup Guide
content: . This should be automatically pushed to your machine - if you do not see it installed you will have the option to install the software when you click on the FastPass button. [INFO] The following instructions are for Mac devices. For indications of the user experience for Windows users, please see Okta’s documentation . We are currently investigating the implementation of Windows Hello. Initial Setup (MacOS) Skip to: Video of the full setup process Click on ‘Sign in with Okta FastPass’ button. You may need to click it twice. 2. Okta Verify on your machine will open up to this screen. Click ‘Add Account’ Your default web browser will launch and display the Okta login page. Enter your Okta username and click 'Next'. Follow the prompts to sign into your Okta account. After successfully signing in, Okta Verify will open again and prompt you to add your Touch ID with Okta Verify. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete this process. Video of the full setup process: There is an Okta icon in your Chrome toolbar for quick and easy access to ALL your apps? If you don't see it, click the puzzle piece then click the pin next to Okta Browser plugin. From here you can quickly log in to your account and quick access to ALL your apps!
